title: How to load a PDB file into x64dbg?
content: I want to see symbols in the disassembly wherever possible, and I have a PDB file for the .exe I'm debugging, but I can't find a way to load the PDB file from disk. Is it even possible?

answers_data.content:
You can use symload/loadsym command.

In the x64dbg console type:

With the last argument, you can control if the validation of symbols shall be skipped or not (1 - skips).

comments.text: Thanks! Could you please point me to where this is documented? I couldn't find it with Google.
hmm, the symload/loadsym text in my answer is the link to x64 documentation page.
